titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for The Judiciary, US Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit, Salaries and Expenses for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for The Judiciary, US Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit, Salaries and Expenses for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This bill limits FY2024 funding for the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit's Salaries and Expenses account.
